name: Heart of mobius
description:
Experience a compelling tale in just an hour!
Introducing the inaugural installment of the "Handy Novel" series.

Dive into the twisted fate of a man who time-traveled with a mission - to kill his past self.
• A minimalist visual novel game, served up with just text and BGM
• Designed to reach all endings in about an hour - perfect for a quick break or insomnia nights
Indulge in a unique reading-gaming hybrid experience!

This PC/Mac version retains the original content of its highly-rated smartphone counterpart (free to download, donation-based), now optimized for a seamless desktop experience.
